title: Toxicologists
context: ยง128D-2.5 Toxicologists. The department may establish permanent exempt positions known as toxicologists for the purpose of assessing human health risk. The positions shall be appointed by the director without regard to chapter 76. [L 1997, c 146, ยง2; am L 2000, c 253, ยง150; am L 2015, c 185, ยง7]
